content: Heard that the validator might be able to run FHIR mapping transforms - is that a thing?

+  .. load IG from ../maptutorial/step1/logical/structuredefinition-tleft.xml
+  .. load IG from ../maptutorial/step1/logical/structuredefinition-tright.xml
 ...success
 ...Failure: null

So it runs, Failure: null possibly means there are no errors, but it produces an empty file:

file step1.xml
step1.xml: empty
